description: Succulent pork with crispy crackling drizzled with a smooth Bare Bones Mushroom Sauce - roast dinner has never looked so good.
keywords: Roast Pork With Rosemary Potatoes & Mushroom Sauce
name: Roast Pork With Rosemary Potatoes & Mushroom Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 kg Woolworths boneless roast pork shoulder

recipeInstructions.text: Warm mushroom sauce according to packet instructions. Serve pork, thickly sliced, with potato, beans and mushroom sauce.
